description: Edited version of a Disney feature film from the novel by Florence Engel Randall. When a teenage girl and her family move into a picturesque old English estate, she immediately senses a strange and powerful presence. Suspense and excitement build as the girl begins to piece together clues to solve a haunting mystery. Teacher preview strongly recommended. Gripping story. No other credits available.
